ygData.msgSnippet: Staff of Writhing....  you know what I meant  =) ... __________________________________________________ Do You Yahoo!? Bid and sell for free at
ygData.messageBody:
Staff of Writhing.... you know what I meant =)

--- HiFi Review <hifireview@...> wrote:
> From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
>
> I actually saw the updated stats at your site. This
> doesn't solve the
> problem. I already have a sacrificial dagger for
> the melee hand but I
> use a staff of withering most of the time. I can't
> use another
> frigging blunt weapon. If they want to make the
> quest impossible,
> that's fine, they can do it. But changing the item
> so it no longer
> does what people put their time and money into, is
> completely unfair.
> The Glowing Black Stone can go in both hands, so let
> people use that
> for Melee hand if they want. I may end up quitting
> the game over this
> one. They had better remove the quests for the Paw
> of Opalla and the
> +10 wis book in Erudin.
>
>
>
